en.subject: Day 7: Master Advanced Analytics
en.preheader: Unlock powerful insights from your procurement data

body.intro: Congratulations! You've been with Purra for a week now. Let's look at what you've achieved and unlock some powerful analytics features.

nextLevel.title: Unlock Advanced Features
items: **Custom Reports** - Generate reports tailored to your specific needs
**Trend Analysis** - Visualize price and market trends over time
**Comparative Analytics** - Compare multiple vendors side-by-side
**Predictive Insights** - Get AI-powered forecasts for price movements
**Export & Integration** - Connect with your existing procurement tools

callout.title: ЁЯОп Ready to Level Up?
callout.description: Schedule a quick call with our team to unlock advanced features and get personalized tips for your industry.

body.footer: You're doing great! Keep exploring and don't hesitate to reach out if you need help.
